languages.text: Ван Калокс объявил непримиримую войну врагам Человечества — будь то ксеносы, слуги Хаоса или еретики в рядах Империума. Не таясь и не опасаясь возмездия, Инквизитор изничтожил многочисленные гнезда скверны в Просторе.

Van Calox declared a relentless war against the enemies of Humanity, be they xenos, servants of Chaos, or heretics in the Imperium's own ranks. The Inquisitor fearlessly eliminated numerous nests of corruption in the Expanse.
languages.original_text: Ван Калокс объявил непримиримую войну врагам Человечества — будь то ксеносы, слуги Хаоса или еретики в рядах Империума. Не таясь и не опасаясь возмездия, Инквизитор изничтожил многочисленные гнезда скверны в Просторе.

traits.locale_text: Van Calox declared an unforgiving war against the enemies of Humanity: whether they were xenos, servants of Chaos, or heretics among the Imperium ranks. Openly and fearlessly, he eliminated numerous nests of corruption in the Expanse.

Van Calox declared an unforgiving war against the enemies of Humanity: whether they were xenos, servants of Chaos, or heretics among the Imperium ranks. Openly and fearlessly, he eliminated numerous nests of corruption in the Expanse.

Van Calox declared a relentless war against the enemies of Humanity: xenos, servants of Chaos, or heretics among the Imperium's ranks. The Inquisitor fearlessly eliminated numerous nests of corruption in the Expanse.

Van Calox declared a relentless war against the enemies of Humanity: xenos, servants of Chaos, or heretics among the Imperium's ranks. The Inquisitor fearlessly eliminated numerous nests of corruption in the Expanse.

Van Calox declared a relentless war against the enemies of Humanity, be they xenos, servants of Chaos, or heretics in the Imperium's own ranks. The Inquisitor fearlessly eliminated numerous nests of corruption in the Expanse.

Van Calox declared a relentless war against the enemies of Humanity, be they xenos, servants of Chaos, or heretics in the Imperium's own ranks. The Inquisitor fearlessly eliminated numerous nests of corruption in the Expanse.

languages.text: 冯·卡洛克斯审判官发动了一场绝不妥协的战争，讨伐所有人类之敌。无论是异形，还是混沌之仆，或者帝国内部的异端，都无法逃过他的怒火。冯·卡洛克斯审判官无所畏惧，在科罗努斯扩区内铲除了无数腐化的巢穴。
languages.original_text: Van Calox declared a relentless war against the enemies of Humanity, be they xenos, servants of Chaos, or heretics in the Imperium's own ranks. The Inquisitor fearlessly eliminated numerous nests of corruption in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 冯·卡洛克斯审判官发动了一场绝不妥协的战争，讨伐所有人类之敌。无论是异形，还是混沌之仆，或者帝国内部的异端，都无法逃过他的怒火。冯·卡洛克斯审判官无所畏惧，在科罗努斯扩区内铲除了无数腐化的巢穴。

languages.text: Van Calox rief einen gnadenlosen Krieg gegen die Feinde der Menschheit aus, ob sie nun Xenos waren, Diener das Chaos oder Ketzer in den Reihen des Imperiums. Der Inquisitor eliminierte furchtlos zahlreiche Nester der Verderbnis in der Ausdehnung.
languages.original_text: Van Calox declared a relentless war against the enemies of Humanity, be they xenos, servants of Chaos, or heretics in the Imperium's own ranks. The Inquisitor fearlessly eliminated numerous nests of corruption in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Van Calox rief einen gnadenlosen Krieg gegen die Feinde der Menschheit aus: Xenos, Diener das Chaos, Ketzer in den Reihen des Imperiums. Der Inquisitor eliminierte furchtlos zahlreiche Nester der Verderbnis in der Ausdehnung.

languages.text: Van Calox lança une guerre sans merci contre les ennemis de l'humanité : les xénos, les serviteurs du Chaos et les hérétiques dans les rangs de l'Imperium. L'inquisiteur élimina vaillamment de nombreux nids de corruption dans les Étendues.
languages.original_text: Van Calox declared a relentless war against the enemies of Humanity, be they xenos, servants of Chaos, or heretics in the Imperium's own ranks. The Inquisitor fearlessly eliminated numerous nests of corruption in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Van Calox lança une guerre sans merci contre les ennemis de l'humanité : les xénos, les serviteurs du Chaos et les hérétiques dans les rangs de l'Imperium. L'inquisiteur élimina vaillamment de nombreux nids de corruption dans les Étendues.

languages.text: Van Calox declaró una guerra implacable contra los enemigos de la Humanidad, fueran xenos, siervos del Caos o herejes ocultos en las filas del Imperium. El Inquisidor acabó sin ninguna duda con muchos de los centros de corrupción de la Extensión.
languages.original_text: Van Calox declared a relentless war against the enemies of Humanity, be they xenos, servants of Chaos, or heretics in the Imperium's own ranks. The Inquisitor fearlessly eliminated numerous nests of corruption in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Van Calox declaró una guerra implacable contra los enemigos de la Humanidad: xenos, siervos del Caos y herejes ocultos en el Imperium. El Inquisidor acabó sin ninguna duda con muchos de los centros de corrupción de la Extensión.

languages.text: ヴァン・カロックスは人類の敵である異種族、渾沌の従者、帝国内の異端者に対する容赦ない戦争を宣言した。異端審問官は大胆不敵にも、エクスパンスにおける数多の腐敗の巣窟を排除してみせた。
languages.original_text: Van Calox declared a relentless war against the enemies of Humanity, be they xenos, servants of Chaos, or heretics in the Imperium's own ranks. The Inquisitor fearlessly eliminated numerous nests of corruption in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: ヴァン・カロックスは人類の敵である異種族、渾沌の従者、帝国内の異端者に対する容赦ない戦争を宣言した。異端審問官は大胆不敵にも、エクスパンスにおける数多の腐敗の巣窟を排除してみせた。

languages.text: Van Calox; zenolar, Kaos hizmetkârları veya İmparatorluk'un kendi saflarındaki kâfirler fark etmeksizin İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı, durmak bilmez bir savaşa girişti. Engizisyoncu, Enginlik'te sayısız yozlaşma yuvasını korkusuzca ortadan kaldırdı.
languages.original_text: Van Calox declared a relentless war against the enemies of Humanity, be they xenos, servants of Chaos, or heretics in the Imperium's own ranks. The Inquisitor fearlessly eliminated numerous nests of corruption in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Van Calox, ister zeno, ister Kaos hizmetkârı, isterse de İmparatorluk'un kendi saflarına dâhil bir kâfir olsun, İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı, durmak bilmez bir savaşa girişti. Engizisyoncu, Enginlik boyunca sayısız yozlaşmışlık yuvasını korkusuzca elemine etti.
